entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `Match.NextMatch` returns incorrect `Index` values for `Regex.Match(string, int, int)` #72704
  • Implement Thread Abort second pass redirection on Unix #72703
  • Composite R2R binaries do not have a copyright in the PE #72701
  • JsonStringEnumConverter does not properly serialize properties with default value (i.e. not set) #72699
  • [libraries-jitstressregs] Assertion failure !CREATE_CHECK_STRING(!"Detected use of a corrupted OBJECTREF. Possible GC hole.") #72697
    7.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Segmentation fault in stress tests #72696
  • ILDAsm and ILAsm don't handle the `no.` prefix #72695
    Future
  • Stepping into R2R ends up in SIGBUS #72692
  • Use custom GC PAL for all GC build flavors #72684
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json uses inconsistent polymorphism semantics with custom `object` converters #72681
    7.0.0
  • ViaHeaderValue throws on TryParse #72677
    7.0.0
  • Cannot serialize/deserialize entity with default value of nullable enum type #72674
  • Reg optional analysis in lowering is missing safety checks #72673
  • STJ source generator fails when two JsonSerializerContext derived types have same name in project #72671
  • [QUIC] Surface transport error code in QuicException #72666
    8.0.0
  • WebAssembly Blazor Breakpoint stopping after it is removed. #72663
    7.0.0
  • Track upstreaming llvm-libunwind patches #72655

Closed

  • m_UnresolvedClassLock is held in an unsafe way for Func Evals #60565
    7.0.0
  • X500DistinguishedName object with ForceUTF8Encoding flag produces different ASN.1 encoding on different platforms #72691
  • .NET 6 TimeZoneInfo.FindSystemTimeZoneById does not support IANA timezone ids on Windows Server 2016 & 2019 #62329
    7.0.0
  • X509AuthorityKeyIdentifierExtension should be public #24931
    7.0.0
  • NativeAOT: Failed to compile virtual statics with default implementation #70930
    7.0.0
  • Internal CLR error when editing code while debugging step by step. #72689
    8.0.0
  • System.Number.BigInteger.DivRem can output an incorrect remainder #72113
    7.0.0
  • PipeReaderStream.ReadInternal throws AggregateException unexpectedly #70206
    7.0.0
  • jit.1 work item failing on mono #67888
    7.0.0
  • Segmentation fault in ilc when building native code for System.Reflection.Tests (NativeAOT, ARM64, Ubuntu 18.04) #71270
    7.0.0
  • Fix incorrect assert for cgroup file system type #62960
    7.0.0
  • HTTP/3: Uninformative message when HTTP/3 connection fails #70949
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.UnscopedRefAttribute #72074
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Tests.ConstructorTests_Default_String.MultipleThreadsLooping #71520
    7.0.0
  • [QUIC] Support for OpenSSL build of MsQuic on Windows #69978
    7.0.0
  • JsonTypeInfo generated using JsonSourceGenerationMode.Serialization throws NotSupportedException on configuration #72614
    7.0.0
  • Test failure: Loader\classloader\SequentialLayout\ManagedSequential\ManagedSequential\ManagedSequential.cmd #70295
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Methodical/explicit/coverage/expl_double_1_r/expl_double_1_r.dll #71917
    7.0.0
  • .NET 7 dotnet-trace output has `???` in stacks on Android #71640
    7.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] HttpConnectionPool may leak authorityExpireTimer / hit ObjectDisposedException #66782
    7.0.0
  • System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetConverter have incorrect nullable annotation #69229
    7.0.0
  • The Enumerable.Chunk can leak memory (.NET 7) #72577
    7.0.0
  • Non-Seekable SubReadStream should not support the Length property. #63040
    7.0.0
  • Resolve inconsistency between \w and \b determination for what is a word character #62619
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Methodical/refany/virtcall_do/virtcall_do.cmd #71806
    7.0.0
  • NativeAOT compiler doesn't check for RequiresUnreferencedCode for methods accessed only through reflection #70698
    7.0.0
  • Warnings about Requires mismatch are not produced when DAM is used #70687
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Bail second pass redirection after catch in thread abort on Unix #72705
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Assertion prop #72700
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix ClonedServer_ActsAsOriginalServer test #72698
    area-System.IO
  • Fix x64 and x86 emulation on arm64 Windows #72693
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Re-enable the ability to use in-build signing #72690
  • Include libnethost.pdb in implementation packages #72688
    area-Setup
  • Refactor marshalling info parser to split overall logic from ordering #72687
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Ensure `GetCorElementType` returns underlying enum type on Mono runtime #72685
    community-contribution
  • Fix finding the Python location if the %TEMP% path contains a space #72683
    community-contribution
  • Fix ReflectionCachesUpdateHandler_CachesCleared test in aggressive trim mode #72682
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • Expands a list of always trimmed mobile+web CA with few recently added #72678
    area-CoreLib-mono, linkable-framework
  • Ldap search crashes on Linux when timeout specified #72676
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [wasm] make debugger less noisy #72675
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Remove Http3RequestStream from _activeRequest when response is read/aborted. #72670
    area-System.Net.Http
  • HTTP/3 Made alt-used show only on alt-svc redirect #72669
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #72667
    area-Meta
  • Update some more dependencies pulling in Newtonsoft.Json 9.0.1 #72662
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add markdown readme for Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyModel #72660
    area-DependencyModel, community-contribution
  • Avoid a couple theoretical reorderings in ManualResetValueTaskSourceCore #72657
    area-System.Threading
  • Introduce a default synchronization context for wasm #72652
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript

Merged

  • Fix debugger funceval deadlock #72179
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Respect ForceUTF8Encoding when encoding an X500DN #72694
    area-System.Security
  • Support ICU on Windows Server 2019 #72656
    area-System.Globalization, breaking-change, 7.0.0
  • Tighten nullable annotations on RegistryKey.GetValue #72679
    area-Microsoft.Win32
  • Add X509AuthorityKeyIdentifierExtension #72640
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact, 7.0.0
  • Utilize new C# support for nameof in attributes in same signature #72686
    area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • Change PipeStream's sync I/O cancellation support to avoid blocking CancellationTokenSource.Cancel #72612
    area-System.IO
  • Add support for static default interface methods #72661
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disable ThrowDuringProcessLog_ShutsDownGracefully test #72680
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • PipeReaderStream.ReadInternal throws AggregateException unexpectedly #70248
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • Fix System.Number.BigInteger.DivRem outputting an incorrect remainder #72115
    area-System.Numerics
  • Add missing nullability annotation in CodeDom #72532
    area-System.CodeDom
  • Disable failing System.Text.Json tests on Android x86 and on Browser with threading enabled #72664
    arch-wasm, arch-x86, area-System.Text.Json, os-android
  • Bump Intellisense package version to Preview6 #72631
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Fix Globalization tests #72653
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove wrong cgroups assert #72372
    area-PAL-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • HTTP/3 Improved message for failing QUIC connection #72374
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Add `UnscopedRefAttribute` #72499
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Some cleanup of assembly helpers in hijack area. #72542
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete ConservativelyReportedRegion and CallingConventionConverterHelpers #72659
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update wasm related README #71951
    arch-wasm, area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Fix potential out-of-bounds array accesses in System.Data.Operators #72654
    area-System.Data
  • [QUIC] Support for OpenSSL build of MsQuic on Windows (Attempt 2) #72609
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Ensure JsonTypeInfo does not fail configuration for valid metadata originating from fast-path sourcegen #72630
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Additional tests for Generics in System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration #72449
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Simplify AppModel addToProject settings #72072
    area-Meta
  • Fixes overwrite of last captured managed stack frame address in EvenPipe stack trace. #72362
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, area-Tracing-mono
  • Fix HttpConnectionPool timers race on disposal #72615
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Add GCDescs in front of MethodTable to dumps #72658
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Correct nullable annotation on ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetConverter #72629
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • [wasm] Return int from console template #72623
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • Port the doc changes to source #72638
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • Clear list in Enumerable.Chunk prior to yielding #72637
    area-System.Linq
  • [LoongArch64] amend the LoongArch64's ABI for GCstress and NullableObject. #72573
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Disable NoStapledOcsp test on Debian 10 for now. #72634
    area-System.Net.Security

Updated

  • [IGNORE][wasm] Testing sharing wasm builds, for running tests #72347
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add analyzer support to validate the stateless marshaller shapes #72643
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • NativeAOT: Guarded devirtualization #64497
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • changing CPU from int to double #66743
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [wasm] Move some defaults out of the templates #72626
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Use Roslyn support for RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan #70179
    NO-MERGE, area-Meta, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Make RateLimiterOptions follow Options pattern #72530
    area-System.Threading
  • Implement ControlledExecution API #71661
    area-VM-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Remove char[] allocations from RegistryKey #66918
    area-Microsoft.Win32, tenet-performance
  • Add RequiresAccessedThrough test to NativeAOT #72649
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • `LibraryImport` generator `AllowUnsafeBlocks` diagnostic #72650
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Add support for Requires in events #72651
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [iOS] Enable Diagnostics.Tracing tests #72545
  • Tear down pending HTTP connection when the originating request completes #71785
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [WIP] Fixing the per object hard limit support for regions #72229
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Make TypeBuilder.CreateType return non nullable #72180
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • [Mono][Arm64] Instrinsify methods for Vector4 on Arm64 #72124
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Add support for specifying Kerberos package on Linux/macOS #72024
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [wasm-ep] Implement DiagnosticServer and startup sessions for WebAssembly #72482
    arch-wasm, area-Tracing-mono
  • Fix overflow check for parsing format strings #72647
    area-System.Numerics
  • [iOS] Remove unnecessary newline from CI script #67861
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-tvos
  • [release/6.0] Work around for UriFormatException caused by \\?\ prefix in the path #71452
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Configuration, 6.0.x
  • Double the size of the previous segment #66930
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • X86 assert fix #72505
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rename [RegexGenerator] to [GeneratedRegex] #72434
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add reference assembly for System.Private.CoreLib.dll #72143
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the wrong GCInfo when testing GCStress. #72572
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add support for the Aho-Corasick algorithm in regexes. #71588
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0][mono] add 400 band workloads #72379
  • Improve reliability of WarningsAsErrors replacement #72070
    area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • Use `GetTempPath2W` if available. #72452
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [iOS] Enable System.Data.Common tests #72554
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on Node.js #68807
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] improve startup #72275
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Use locateFile to resolve path for assets outside of remoteSources #69441
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • [wasm] reduce legacy interop usage #72021
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [QUIC] Remove connection state from QuicStream #72599
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add setter to TransactionManager.DefaultTimeout and MaxTimeout. #71703
    area-System.Transactions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable NI_Vector256_Create on AVX1 #72522
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enabling some tests back onto the Interpreted engine #72639
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-22
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • Invalidate stackwalk cache if handling chained unwind info #1942

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HotReload files generated in a wrong path for MAUI Blazor projects #26762

PullRequests

Created

  • [Blazor] Update the base path to use IntermediateOutputPath #26765
    Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • [24068] Remove Legacy -- behavior and use of UnparsedTokens #26761
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-CLI, cli-ux, 7.0.1xx
  • Move the nuget cache creation into the work item creation class #26764
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Detect invalid package locales and warn the user #26729
    Area-Infrastructure
  • dotnet/templating#3829 evaluating project context for dotnet new execution #26523
    Area-Infrastructure
  • MSBuild server V2 #26104
    Area-CLI
  • Migrate dotnet new Cli, dotnet-new3, *.IntegrationTests, *.UnitTests, template_feed to SDK #26521
    Area-Templates

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-22
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Record Default Constructor Accessibility #6309
  • [API Proposal]: Consistent interface members #6305

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Implicit parameters #6300

PullRequests

Merged

  • Unchecked conversions between nint and nuint types can be optimized away. #6298

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Implicit interface implementation in derived class fails for embedded interop interface types explicitly implemented by base class #62863
  • Major performance regression of the array initialization pattern #62864
  • Emit DynamicallyAccessedMembers for where T : new() #62857
  • IDE0051 erroneously triggers for required awaitable/awaiter members #62856
    Backlog
  • Low level struct improvements allow returning references to a current method's stack #62850

Closed

  • Bug: `required` keyword completion does not work in `record` and `record struct` types #62873
  • Public API for "file-local types" #62254
    17.4
  • IDE warning: null possibility after de-nulling in do-while loop #62866
  • Emit `GC.AllocateUninitializedArray` for an initialized array creation expression #61011
    17.4

PullRequests

Created

  • Produce binding errors for incomplete members #62874
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Move to a simpler form of checksum->solution caching in the remote workspace layer. #62872
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Fix PR Validation pipeline" #62870
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Derive type names analyzer from AbstractBuiltInCodeStyleDiagnosticAnalyzer #62869
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Revert "Add array initialization optimization" #62868
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix async rename prefs string #62867
    Area-IDE
  • FindMethodSymbolInType - handle the case when a type definition is resolved to a type in a different module. #62865
    Area-Compilers
  • Move AnalyzerOptionsProvider to Analyzers layer #62859
    Area-IDE, Community
  • WIP not for review. #62854
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Revert "Merge pull request #62853 from CyrusNajmabadi/oopCaching2" #62875
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #62806
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62871
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Ensure OOP solution fast-path cache properly refcounts items during processing #62853
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Ensure we don't throw first-chance exceptions if we have a null stack #62852
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62828
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove unneeded 'using OptionSet = ...' #62769
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Break unnecessary inheritance of parentheses analyzers #62862
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Simplify `AbstractBuiltInCodeStyleDiagnosticAnalyzer` constructors #62826
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.3-vs-deps #62858
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Simplify task management in inline-rename code. #62842
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1895883 #62839

Updated

  • Document Outline Feature #61784
    Area-IDE
  • Run suppressors insofar as there are suppressible errors #62641
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement IAttributeOperation #59369
    Area-Compilers, Community, Feature - IOperation
  • File types EE support #62812
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove unnecessary tracking of unmatched parameters in method invocation escape analysis #62847
    Area-Compilers
  • HasChangesAsync should return false if the document content did not changed #62849
    Area-Interactive
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE
  • Improve circularity analysis in bases for some scenarios. #62799
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove support for 'ref scoped' #62788
    Area-Compilers
  • Enable updated escape rules if System.Runtime.CompilerServices.RuntimeFeature.ByRefFields exists #62304
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Support renaming multiple symbols in RenameLanguageService #62670
    Area-IDE
  • ci build cleanup #62845
    Area-Infrastructure
  • correctness build optimizations #62797
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor] Enable cancellation of navigation events #42877
    7.0-rc1
  • SignalR guaranteed message delivery #42874
  • dotnet.timezones.blat & dotnet.timezones.blat.gz do not have the same contents on Publish #42873
  • Changing CSS in RCL forces app restart when using BlazorWebView #42871
  • blazor: using open/close region vs passing int sequence numbers to component creator method #42870
  • Incorporate version numbers into Blazor _framework / _content filenames to force browser resource load #42869

Closed

  • Using C# in the Internet browser from an ASP.NET MVC application #42875
    Discussions
  • What will happen if C# p/invokes a C++ WASM module that starts a WebWorker and then calls back to C# callback? #42851
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Testing failed to build with error MSB4186 #42772
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Microsoft Default Blazor WASM app not launched in Https configuration #42745
  • Issue running .net6.0 (arm64) under IIS on Windows 11 ARM64 - missing version '6.0.o' (arm64) #42699
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Fix active Component Governance bugs #37889
    7.0-preview3
  • Cannot bind StringValues for optional HTTP request header with Minimal APIs #40752
    7.0-rc1
  • Expose location changing event for NavigationManger #14962
    7.0-rc1
  • Faster creating query string in 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Extensions.QueryBuilder' #42810
  • Problem Restoring NuGet Packages #42868
  • No default value for missing Enumerable QueryParameter #42320
    .NET 7 Planning
  • ASP.Net Hosting Bundle Installer Has Issues In Some Situations #42764
    7.0-rc2

PullRequests

Created

  • Split Blazor WASM Auth Tests to New Project #42879
    area-mvc, 7.0-rc1
  • Fix the code to ignore parameters from incorrect locations #42878
    area-web-frameworks
  • Fix UsePathBase with WAB #42876
    area-runtime
  • Add Description to OpenApiResponseBody #42872
    area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Updating _AddContentRootForProjectReferences target #42863
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc1
  • Allow binding to StringValues? with Minimal APIs #41789
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc1
  • Allow cancellation of navigation events in Blazor #42638
    area-blazor, 7.0-rc1
  • Issue #42810 : Changes `StringBuilder` to `ValueStringBuilder` in QueryBuilder.cs #42867
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-rc1
  • Allow Collection Default Value binding #42824
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc1
  • Add logging to QUIC tests and disable parallel execution #42853
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1

Updated

  • Log a warning when using an untrusted developer certificate #42621
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • [Migrated] - Generate Composite Images Redistributable #42506
    area-infrastructure
  • Remove RequestDelegateFactory call from RouteEndpointBuilder #42827
    area-runtime
  • Task and ValueTask are not covariant #41719
    area-runtime
  • Adding a new Http3Cat project to ease testing #42861
    area-runtime
  • [Blazor] Dynamic authentication requests #42692
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm-auth
  • Update templates to incorporate net7 changes #42802
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, 7.0-rc1
  • Route tooling #42597
    area-web-frameworks

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SOS's GCHeapsTraverse doesn't work for server GCs #3218
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Updated

    dotnet-trace, dotnet-counters, dotnet-dump, dotnet-stack

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Custom controls existing in XAML at launch time are not updated via HotReload (.NET MAUI) #8948
  • Fix (or don't) the behavior of calling "Focus" on Android to open the picker #8946
    6.0-servicing
  • Add "Open/Close" API to picker controls #8945
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Apply TimePicker and DatePicker focus changes to Picker control #8944
    6.0-servicing
  • Collection View Header and Empty View not showing on Android when ItemSource is null #8934
  • Button IsEnabled does not restore visual state #8932
  • Make CalendarDatePickerExtensions.ToDateFormat public for .NET 7 #8931
    .NET 7
  • App crashes only in release and only on physical device #8928
  • Pull to refresh on RefreshView does not hide the refresh indicator. #8926
  • Label inside a HorizontalStackLayout inside a Border does not work with TailTruncation #8925
  • ScrollView inside border is not working in Mac and iOS #8923
    6.0-servicing
  • CollectionView seems to reuse images when loading more on Android. #8920
  • CollectionView lagging on start scrolling for Android #8919

Closed

  • PlatformBehavior can't be attached to a view Behaviors list #8907
  • [iOS]Wrong cursor position in Editor on ios and maccatalyst #7691
  • SecureStorage #8921
  • MT1008: Failed to launch the simulator: Value cannot be null. #8833
  • What is the difference between debug and release on iOS? #8927
  • How to profile MAUI on iOS? #8875
  • Invoking PropertyChanged() on .NET Maui does not notify Binding View on Android. Works on Windows and iOS. #8900
  • CollectionView not scrolling inside a StackLayout or without setting HeightRequest #8888
  • Catalyst app under Mac idiom crashes on start when using slider control #8715
    6.0-servicing
  • Maui DesignTools.dll is missing Embedded Image resources #8726
    6.0-sr4
  • Auto Update MAUI App #8800
  • Ship my Xamarin.UITest to work with MAUI framework #7368
  • Style OnIdiom not working for Tablet & Desktop #8641

PullRequests

Created

  • [VisualDiagnostics] Allow RegisterSourceInfo to update existing targets #8947
    partner/ui-tools, do-not-merge
  • Build maui.aar on CI #8943
  • Non shell aot #8941
  • Shell tab aot #8939
  • Add Admin check for removing needs-info labels #8933
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Make CalendarDatePickerExtensions.ToDateFormat internal until .NET 7 #8930
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
  • [SingleProject] Fix SplashScreen behavior on Tizen #8917
    area/single project ☝️, partner/tizen

Merged

  • Make Date/Time Pickers on Android only pop up when tapped/clicked/enter key hit #8913
    area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker
  • [Android] Fix clear button not working on Entry #7992
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-sr3
  • `IChangeToken` Nullability Fix #8937
  • Update the .NET 6 Version of MAUI #8924
  • Remove validation exceptions Slider min/max values #8560
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-slider
  • Update to Preview 7 #8884
  • Update WindowsAppSDK #8914

Updated

  • Tooltip Text support for Views #8864
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/controls 🎮, .NET 7
  • Workaround VS Bug with using dotnet 7 workloads #8316
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [MacCatalyst] Fix Button appearance on Catalyst using UIDeviceFamily 6 #7841
    t/bug, do-not-merge, area/desktop 🖥️, control-button, 6.0-sr3
  • Disconnect old handler after setting new handler #8781
  • [Windows] Fix DatePicker TextColor property #7995
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker, 6.0-sr3
  • Preserve the correct binding context for menu items #7358
    area/desktop 🖥️, 6.0-sr3
  • Add MauiUIApplicationDelegate.PerformFetch #7982
    .NET 7
  • [Android] Fix crash in SwipeView collapsing ListView groups #8651
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮
  • Merge Maui.Graphics into Maui! (net7.0 / main) #8739
    area/drawing ✏️
  • [Housekeeping] Added more Windows Device Tests (added around 900 tests) #8854
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.AccessViolationException in Add-Migration #28497
  • [CosmosDB] - EFCore is failing to save when same object is assigned to entity properties twice #28495
  • EF Core, CI/CD, and Migrations w/ breaking changes #28494

Closed

  • Make EntityEntryGraphIterator publicly usable #26461
    7.0.0
  • EF 7.0.0-preview.6.22329.4: Method not found: 'Void CoreTypeMappingParameters..ctor... #28496

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix grammar typo in XML doc #28493
  • Pack of API review changes #28490
  • Make EntityEntryGraphIterator publicly usable #28459

Updated

  • Sugar for sequence-based key value generation on SQL Server #28477
    providers-beware
  • Add support for Global Query Filters on derived types. #27978
    propose-close, waiting-for-response

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-22
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • With NET7 preview 7installed, Some files are not identical in .exe installer and in .zip package. #14140

Updated

  • [ARM64] x64 .NET 7 SDK could not be installed on arm64 OS #14127
  • .NET 6 Mac OS runtime installer puts .NET x64 on ARM Mac M1 #14103

PullRequests

Merged

  • Disable repo prebuilt baseline during tarball builds #14192
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #14188

Updated

  • Eliminate 7.0 source-build prebuilts #14167
  • Simplify our PR builds. #14150
